name: Snowboarding in the Wild
description:
Snowboarding in the Wild is the ultimate rush!

The goal is to snowboard down huge jumps and make it to the bottom of the mountain alive. The gameplay is highly addictive as the levels start off simple and easy but eventually require a great amount of skill to complete.

Guide wild animals as they snowboard down steep icy slopes through several Acts and 18 different mountains. Feed them milk bottles at just the right time to boost their speed over treacherous rocks, trees, icicles, and more. Bust out double, triple, or quadruple flips as they launch of cliffs and jumps.

Choose from wild puppies, bunnies, kittens, hamsters, piglets, bear cubs, baby cheetahs, lambs, baby porcupines and many more. Beat more levels to unlock more wild creatures, and reveal special animals like the secret panda bear.

Snowboarding in the Wild features:
- Advanced OpenGL graphics
- Music and sound effects
- High-resolution textures
- Optimized for HD retina screens
- Made for iPhone 4, iPad, iPhone 3G, 3Gs, and iPod Touch (all versions)

Snowboarding in the Wild is brought to you by the makers of iRollerCoaster and iBASEjump.

Experience the wild terrain with your new pets on adventures neither of you will ever forget!
